title: Discussão (A)
body: The first issue was published on February 8, 1855, and the last on August 28, 1858, totaling 77 issues. Its editors were Antonio Correia Heredia, Dr. Antonio Gonçalves de Freitas, João de Sant'Ana e Vasconcelos, and Dr. Alvaro Rodrigues de Azevedo.

1855: Publication of the first issue of the newspaper 'Discussão (A)'.
1858: Publication of the last issue of the newspaper 'Discussão (A)'.
